mapper.select: select a.device_code, a.device_value, a.device_time from device a, device b group by a.device_code, a.device_value, a.device_time having a.device_time = max(b.device_time)
mapper.insert: insert into device(device_id, device_type, device_code, device_value, device_time) values(dev_seq.nextval, #{deviceType}, #{deviceCode}, #{deviceValue}, #{deviceTime})
